features: 15W Samsung Wireless Charger: Put your phone on the wireless charger samsung Charging Pad Station to get started Charging, up to 1.8X faster than standard wireless charger, 3X faster than the original 5W charger. Wireless charging station provides 15W for Samsung Galaxy S24 S23 S22 S21, 10W for Samsung Galaxy Note 10, 7.5W output for iPhone 14 13 12 11 Series, and 5W for other smartphones and AirPods & Galaxy Buds.The wireless iPhone charger comes with a QC 3.0 18W adapter for a stable power supply.

Wide Compatibility: Wireless phone charger is optimized for the fastest charging on most devices,can support for Google Pixel 7A/7 Pro/7/6/6 Pro/5,Samsung Galaxy S24/S24+/S24 Ultra, S23/S23+/S23 Ultra, S22/S22+/S22 Ultra, S21/S21 FE/S21+/S21 Ultra, S20/S20 FE/S20+/S20 Ultra, iPhone 14/14 Pro/14 Pro Max/14 Plus,iPhone 13/13 Pro/13 Pro Max/13 Mini,iPhone 12/12 Pro/12 Pro Max/12 Mini,iPhone 11/11 Pro/11 Pro Max,iPhone X/XS/XR/XS MAX, AirPods 2/Pro, Galaxy Buds, Pixel Buds

Easy Charging wireless phone charger for android: Our wireless iphone charger fast charging features non-slip silicone material on the up and down sides, ensuring that your device stays in place while charging. The GREEN LED Indicator will flash for 3s if power source is connected, and will turn off after 16 seconds while going charging mode, never disturbing your sleep.

Case-Friendly: Fast wireless charger samsung S23 charger is slim enough to put it in your pocket and supports charging through general plastic/silicone phone cases less than 5mm thick. It's lightweight, sleek, and compact, making it easy to carry and store during travel or business. (Note: Magnetic and metal attachments or cards will prevent charging.)

Certified & Safe Charging: Our Google Pixel 7Pro wireless fast charger come with 18W Wall Plug is rigorously Certified & Charging tested to ensure a secured and easy charging experience. It prevents the wireless charger and your iPhone from overcharging, over current, over voltage, over heating, and short circuit, giving your phone multiple protection. We offer 24-hour customer service. If you have any questions while using our product, please feel free to connect with us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The charger works great and charges fast.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as intended
reviews.reviewText: Bought this as a replacement since my last charger stopped working. Was happy to see that they had it in white and is, overall, aesthetically pleasing. Pictured is the percent of charge my phone was on and how long it would take to get to 100%. As is with most of these, the charge speed will be significantly slower than a regular, USB-C charger. But that is not something I'm particularly picky about. This served my needs and works well with my S21 Ultra. (NOTE: the green light does turn off -- it lights up when placed on top and again when it reaches 100%)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Performs Perfectly Charges Fast
reviews.reviewText: So far, charging is reliable. Pad lights up to let me know when phone is properly recognized and charging.Good Value

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Working great so far. Fast hookup with existing cables and charging blocks, either Samsung or aftermarket. Always fast charges from 0% to 97% until phone reaches 100%.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Simple to set up, works great. My samsung has had difficulty charging with the cable so this was my solution and I'm so happy with it!!! It does not charge my husband's phone but it is an older samsung so maybe that's why.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Charges faster than upright model
reviews.reviewText: Quite a bit faster charging S23 ultra than upright model

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars It worked, but then......
reviews.reviewText: I was doubtful if this charging pad really worked, given the fact I had an Otterbox thick case surrounding my phone. But it did...for a few days, THEN I found out that it was recharging my phone WAY too slowly! Example: I took my Samsung A24 phone with 55% battery life and set it on the charging pad. It said, "3hrs 15min to charge". I then plugged in the regular Samsung cord to the wall socket and it read, "1hr 10mins to charge". You do the math!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like these, nice to not have to find a plug in the dark when going to bed at night. Just lay it on and it works.I do have a case on my phone, as does my wife, but hers does not always want to charge. Our cases are different, so hers may be on the "bit thicker" side and could affect the performance.Personally I think they are great.
